scholarship_description: "Our coding bootcamp scholarship directory features more than 40 unique scholarships"
"The Women Take Tech Initiative scholarship awards a 50% discount on tuition to females"
requirements: "all Flatiron School campus-based and online courses globally"

scholarship_description: "Any minorities or women who enroll in classes at the academy can receive a tuition discount"
"Grand Circus is also using scholarships to help diversify the program and the tech industry in general"
requirements: "Anyone who identifies as a woman, Latinx, LGBTQ+, Native American, Black, or Veteran is eligible and recipients will be awarded $1,750"

scholarship_description: "DigitalCrafts is working to make tech careers more accessible to minority groups including female, Latinx, and Black students who are underrepresented in the tech industry"
requirements: "Women who are pursuing an undergraduate or master's degree and are majoring in science, technology, engineering, or mathematics during the 2022 school year"
